Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your endeavors. Given its value and potential impact on your projects, I am extending this exclusive opportunity to you. Considering the exceptional quality and features of the product, I propose a price of $14,000. This offer not only ensures you secure a high-quality item at a competitive price but also allows us to collaborate with someone we truly believe will appreciate and utilize it to its full potential. Please let me know if you have any questions or need further information. I look forward to your positive response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $14,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $14,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $12,000
